headline: Tell HN: Google does not list application permissions in the Play Store any more
description:
https://postimg.cc/6y3Z9yjY

They had implemented that already a while ago, then reverted the behaviour, and now implemented it once again.

It seems as if it was not "enabled" for everyone yet, however.

They hid the permissions with each version better and better and apparently decided now, users don't need them at all.
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：谷歌不再在Play Store中列出应用程序的权限
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：谷歌不再在Play Store中列出應用程序的權限
description_zh-Hans:
https://postimg.cc/6y3Z9yjY

他们不久前已经实施了这一做法，然后又恢复了这一行为，现在又再次实施。

不过，好像还没有对每个人都启用"启用"。

他们把每个版本的权限隐藏得越来越好，显然现在决定，用户根本就不需要这些。
description_zh-Hant:
https://postimg.cc/6y3Z9yjY

他們不久前已經實施了這一做法，然後又恢復了這一行為，現在又再次實施。

不過，好像還沒有對每個人都啟用"啟用"。

他們把每個版本的權限隱藏得越來越好，顯然現在決定，用戶根本就不需要這些。
